attributes.action: See hamas as the democratically elected government of Palestine as they represent are large percentage of the Palestinian people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2006 Hamas were democratically elected by the people of Palestine. However, as Hamas are standing up against this illegal Israeli occupation of Palestinian land they have unfortunately been labelled as a terrorist organisation. This petition is calling for democracy to be respected by the government of the UK. This petition also calls for dialogue between Hamas and The British government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
